channel.title: ATCAS on Nancy's Creative Mess
channel.description: Recent content in ATCAS on Nancy's Creative Mess

item.title: *Addicted to CAS #230*
item.description: There’s a new challenge at Addicted to CAS that starts today. The code word is Autumn. Play along with us by sharing you clean and simple cards HERE! I had fun doing a little ink blending on a piece of cardstock and then stamping and cutting out these fun leaves. I don’t use a lot of brown in my cards but an autumn theme and these colours called for some brown.

item.title: *Addicted to CAS #229*
item.description: We’re back with another Addicted to CAS challenge… Just a quick post for me before I head off to work. I usually do my blogging on Wednesday mornings before work and I lost Wednesday morning to Urgent Care (see yesterdays post) so I am feeling more than a little behind! Card Info *Cardstock: Yupo *Images: Studio Katia Birthday Greetings *Ink: Versafine Clair Nocturne; Tim Holtz Alcohol Inks in Raspberry, Glacier, Alchemy (pearl)

item.title: *Addicted to CAS #228*
item.description: It’s time for a new clean and simple challenge at Addicted to CAS. This challenge was difficult for me…. because I don’t like birds! I have a few in my stash but they don’t really get used. But something different happened when the current Stampin’ Up! catalogue came out and I NEEDED these sweet bird stamps and the punch that goes with it! Card Info *Cardstock: Stampin’ Up! Granny Apple Green, Bermuda Bay, Pumpkin Pie

item.title: *Addicted to CAS #227*
item.description: There’s a new challenge at Addicted to CAS today… time to show us your clean and simple creations featuring the colour pink! I don’t know why but I struggled with this prompt…. but then I gabbed out some stencils and had a little play with them. I stencilled the pink swirls first and then put a second stencil on top of the first stencil and used Glimmer Paste so that the sparkly circles only showed up on the pink swirls.

item.title: *Addicted to CAS #226*
item.description: Happy Saturday crafty friends! It’s time for a new challenge with the team at Addicted to CAS! I hope you’ll head over to the blog to see what the design team has come up with for this challenge as there’s always some great inspiration by my team mates! And we’d love to see you play along with us too! As I recently had another challenge that was a tropical theme (where I did florals) I decided to turn my focus to a tropical drink instead.

item.title: *Addicted to CAS #225*
item.description: The code word at Addicted to CAS is Nautical… I hope you’ll play along. The design team has created some fun ideas that you can see HERE. I had a bit in my stash that would have been ok for this challenge but nothing that was speaking to me… so I used some dies to create my nautical themed card instead. Card Info *Cardstock: Stampin’ Up! Sweet Sorbet, Starry Sky

item.title: *Addicted to CAS #224*
item.description: Happy Saturday!! It’s time for a new challenge with the team at Addicted to CAS! For the next two weeks we’d like you share how you interpret the code word of “kids”… be sure to go to the blog to see what the rest of the design team has done because there are some other fabulous cards! I went with a new baby card, partly because I needed a few in my stash!

item.title: *Addicted to CAS #223*
item.description: Good morning crafty friends… it’s time for a new challenge with Addicted to CAS! We are playing with the code word GRID for this challenge. I will admit that I struggled with this challenge. I had no idea how to interpret this word. But then I remembered I had some patterned papers that had a grid-look to them… and I went with the one that was more delicate looking to create my card for today.

item.title: *Addicted to CAS #222*
item.description: It’s time for a new challenge at Addicted to CAS… the code word for challenge #222 is DOTS! There are so many wonderfully fun ideas on the challenge blog by the design team… I hope you’ll go check them out. And then you need to create your own dotted masterpieces to share with us! I wanted to have some fun with the new Stampin’ Up! In Color colours for 2022-2024… so I used some old circle punches and cut out a bunch in three different colours.

item.title: *Addicted to CAS #221*
item.description: It’s time for a new challenged with Addicted to CAS… for the next two weeks, we want to see you sharing your cards featuring stripes! I am the host for this challenge, which means this theme was my idea! Please share your clean and simple cards with strips with us HERE! I had a bit of trouble deciding on what I wanted to do for my card for this challenge… I have a lot of options when it comes to stripes.

item.title: *Addicted to CAS #220*
item.description: Challenge #220 at Addicted to CAS is all about flowers…. we can’t wait to see your beautiful flower creations! You get a bonus card from me today…. I created my alcohol ink background and fit two flower dies on it … and since they are so similar I decided to share them both in one post I really hope you’ll play along and share your cards HERE!

item.title: *Addicted to CAS #219*
